Html:
What is the future of this project since MS released the WPF Themes on their WPF Codeplex site?

http://wpf.codeplex.com/Wiki/View.aspx?title=WPF%20Themes&referringTitle=Home

It appears you and MS are using the same themes based on Silverlight themes.  Are you involved with MS?  Keep up the good work.  Would like to see some new content soon.
